approvalStepTime.description: Assignment time to the current approver.

pageCount.description:
Total number of pages in the document, first index is 1. This number might not be equal
to number of Pages, because if document has too many pages, some of them may be skipped
due to performance reasons

isReturned.description: True if documents was returned to the sender.

size.description: Size of the document in KB

isAttachment.description: Indicates if document is an attachment

isValidated.description: Indicator if document has been validated

isEdited.description: Indicator, if this document has been edited (at least one field, note or tag has been changed)

pages.description: List of all pages that are part of an extraction.

isPostProcessCompleted.description: Indicator, if the post processing has completed

isPrevalidated.description: Whether or not a doc has some prevalidation pp scripts

lastOpenUserId.description: Id of the user that last opened this document

isLocked.description: Determines whether document is locked or not

validationTime.description: The time the document has been validated

version.description: Version number, incremented with every update

currentApproverId.description: Id of user that has to approve this document

lastApprovalStepTime.description: Assignment time to the current approver

isCurrentApproverNotificationSent.description: Notification was sent to the current approver

authorizedUserIds.description: Users authorized to access the document

duplicateDocIds.description: Duplicate document IDs (based on fields values)

hasMore.description: True if search can return more values

ApiDocumentListRequest.description: List request for documents. Searches documents to find all that match criteria.

text.description: Search text used for general searches

scopes.description: List of all scopes that should be retrieved.

ApiDocumentListSortFields.description: List of properties on which the results can be sorted

ApiDocumentScope.description: Document scope that filters what parts of the document should be returned

port.description: Port on which the host server is exposing the service

ApiEnum.description: Enum data for field type enum

isEditable.description: Indicates whether enum can be edited

fieldValue.description: Value to the field formatted as string

enumName.description: Name of the enum. Only present if field type has the value ENUM.

pluginResults.description:
List of plugin results in key-value format where key is plugin id and value contains
information about the plugin.

isModifiedByPlugin.description: Whether the field was changed by a plugin

isNotValidated.description: Field was hidden at time of validation

words.description: Field was hidden at time of validation

isRequired.description: Indicator, if this field is mandatory

isTenantSpecific.description: True if field comes from the model

provideValueListToCore.description:
Indicator, if the list of unique values of this field can be loaded into core and be
used for OCR (which creates its word "dictionary" and is used for spell-check)

metadata.description: All headers attached to the container

ApiFolderWithMembers.description: Container metadata with metadata of documents inside the container

metadata.description: All headers attached to the container

modifiedByPostProcessing.description: Indicates if this value was modified by post processing

cells.description: List of all cells in this column. Count should be always equal to number of columns.

pageIndex.description: Index of page to which the table belongs.

rows.description: List of row definitions and cells in each row.

skip.description: How many items to skip from the start of the list. Allows for pagination.

take.description: Maximum number of list items that will be returned

ApiListSortDirection.description: Direction in which list values are sorted

unknownUserFolder.description: Folder for emails from unknown users

allowUnknownUsers.description:
Allow moving mail to invalid user. This prevents misconfiguration to cause unwanted
movements of email.

width.description: Width of the page in pixels.

height.description: Height of the page in pixels.

rotation.description: Rotation of the page in degrees.

words.description: List of all words present on the page.

pluginName.description: Gets or sets name of script that has validated this document

value.description: Gets or sets the collection of localized messages

extraInformationRequired.description: Gets or sets whether extra information is needed

extraInformationMessage.description: Gets or sets the extra information requirements message

ApiTenantCreateEmailServer.description: Email server for creation of Tenant

hasMore.description: True if search can return more values

ApiUserListRequest.description: List request for users. Searches users to find all that match criteria.

text.description: Search text used for general searches

ApiUserResetPayload.description: Object with parameters for resetting the user

ApiUserSortListFields.description: Enum for declaring sorting parameters of user

ApiUserUpdatePayload.description: Object with parameters for resetting the user

wordId.description: Id of the word, unique for one document

pageIndex.description: Index of the page the word is presented

DateTimeNullableApiFilterEqualRange.description: Filter which combines equal and range filters

Offset.description: Defines two-dimensional offset with X and Y coordinates.

RedQueStatus.description: Status response data. Used as a response when request returns no data.
